tool_description: Get useful crypto token data and logo given an address from multiple chains.
name: Cryptofonts Token Icon API
title: Cryptofonts Token Icon API

api_list.name: Get info by chainId and address
api_list.description: Get info by chainId and address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptofonts-token-icon-api1.p.rapidapi.com/1/0x7d1afa7b718fb893db30a3abc0cfc608aacfebb0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptofonts-token-icon-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptofonts-token-icon-api1.p.rapidapi.com/{chainid}/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptofonts-token-icon-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
